name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX+
overview: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX+ (also known as Maximum Tune 5DX+, or simply Maxi 5DX+) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the ninth game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade game series and the final update of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5. This update adds two car makers (Lamborghini and Honda), Hiroshima Expressway, and exclusively in the Japanese and Indonesian version, a new Ghost Battle mode was added that involves facing other ghosts from other countries from the International versions of 5DX+, similar to Japan Challenge in the International versions.
